type1_missing.reasoning: No API endpoint exists to fetch current authenticated user's information. Dashboard requires displaying user's name but uses hardcoded mock data (line 42 dashboard/page.tsx). While login/register return user data initially, on page refresh there is no way to retrieve current user information.

type2_incorrect.reasoning: Client-side error handling incorrectly uses data.error object directly as string instead of extracting data.error.message, which would display '[object Object]' instead of the actual error message
Login endpoint uses error code 'MISSING_CREDENTIALS' instead of specified 'MISSING_FIELDS' for missing required fields
Statistics bar uses single card containing all metrics instead of multiple cards/boxes for visual separation as specified (plural 'cards/boxes' implies separate containers)

type3_extraneous.reasoning: Functions clearCompletedTasks, deleteAllTasks, and toggleAllTasks (lines 153-181) are implemented but never used in any API endpoint or UI component. Section 4.3 lists these as examples of operations that must be atomic if implemented, not as required features.
